animeDescription: Grick is a young chipmunk living in the city with his sister. But after hearing from a carrier pigeon of the Chipmunk homeland, the Great Forest, he leaves home alone. Grick meets both friends and enemies along his adventure to find the place where he truly belongs.
animeStaff: [['Nishimaki Hideo', ['Director']], ['Fuji Mineo', ['Episode Director']], ['Koroku Reijirou', ['Music']], ['Saitou Atsuo', ['Original Creator']]]
